title: Plan and Execute Mill Reline
description: A maintenance planner organizes a major shutdown to replace the worn steel liners inside a large SAG mill.

tasks.description: Based on wear rate forecasts, schedule the next mill reline for a specific date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reline is scheduled in the long-term plan.

tasks.description: Order the new set of liners and all necessary bolts and tooling, ensuring they arrive before the shutdown.
tasks.expected_outcome: All materials for the reline are ordered and their delivery is tracked.

tasks.description: Execute the reline, managing the crews to remove the old liners and install the new ones as safely and quickly as possible to minimize plant downtime.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reline is completed safely and ahead of schedule.
